casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Devante Deshane CARTER, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156927
COA: 338905 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 26, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant's motion for relief from judgment is prohibited by MCR 6.502(G).
